alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 11:04AM EST until further notice by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Sagadahoc and Kennebec Counties. For the Kennebec River...including Skowhegan, North Sidney, Augusta, Hallowell...Minor up to Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Skowhegan. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 35,000.0 cfs, Flooding begins at campgrounds in Skowhegan. At 60,000.0 cfs, East River Road starts to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Friday the flow was 11,428.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 56,060.0 cfs just after midnight tonight. - Flood flow is 35,000.0 cfs. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
